Title: Apple AI tool transcribed the word 'racist' as 'Trump'
Description: Experts have questioned the company's explanation that it is due to the two words being similar.

Title: Half of homes need heat pump by 2040, government told
Description: The UK's greenhouse gas emissions should fall to 13% of 1990 levels by 2040, government advisors say.

Title: Google rolls out new Gemini Live experience with saved audio recordings
Description: Google previously announced Gemini Live tweaks, and they're rolling out for at least one Pixel 9 Pro XL user as of today.

Title: What if I'm missing a form? Attorneys answer tax questions from NPR's audience
Description:
We asked our listeners to send us their most befuddling questions about the 2025 tax season.
What if you can't pay your tax bill? How good is online tax software? Two tax attorneys weigh in.

Title: Framework unveils new repairable and upgradeable laptops and desktop
Description: Framework launched new versions of its 12-inch and 13-inch laptops as well as a new desktop computer today -- all with repairable and upgradeable options.

Title: 100 intelligence staffers to be fired for engaging in explicit chats: Gabbard
